title: APlusLift 12,000LB 2-Post Overhead Single Release Direct Drive Car Lift with 3 Year Warranty - HW-12HD
body_html:
All 2-Post Car Lifts

  • The product is expected to be delivered in about 90-120 days starting from the day the product is ordered. We require a 10% down (non-refundable) and the remaining balance paid before we ship it to your location. Please email us if you are interested.

  • Industry leading 3 YEAR WARRANTY (a $499 value!)

  • Single Point Safety Lock Release System

  • Two Set of 2 3/4" and 5 1/2" Tall Truck Adapters Included; 77 15/16" Lift Height Maximum with Truck Adapters

  • CE Certified Lift Structure and Hydraulic System - Tested for 115% Dynamic Load Capacity and 150% Static Load Capacity

  • All Robot Welded Structure with Durable Powder Coated Finish

APlusLift HW-12HD is a 12000LB single point release overhead car lift (auto hoist) built with quality materials and good workmanship.

We are proud to offer an industry leading 3 year warranty for all parts (a $499 value)! We have all replacement and optional parts available for our lifts.

Free shipping to lower 48 states with forklift (or similar) on-site, or free pickup at nearby terminal. Car lifts require on-site forklift (no liftgate). We strongly recommend against renting a forklift; expense not reimbursed. See shipping policy below for limited access/remote/high-cost areas.

Warehouse Pickup Locations (Contact Us for $300 Discount): Chicago (IL), Mansfield (OH), Tacoma (WA).

Frequently Asked Product, Order, and Shipping Questions and Technical Questions

Specifications
Model HW-12HD
(This Model)		 AP-12SR
(for Comparison)
Manual HW-12HD Manual AP-12SR Manual
Style Overhead Overhead
Lock Release Single Point Release Single Point Release
Warranty 3 Years (36 Months) 3 Years (36 Months)
Lifting Capacity 12,000 LB 12,000 LB
Overall Height 160" 165"
Overall Width 137 13/32" 149"
Maximum Lift height with Truck Adapters 77 15/16" 79"
Maximum Lift height without Truck Adapters 72 7/16" 70"
Minimum Height of Adjustable Pads from Ground 5 1/8" 4"
Drive Through Width (Carriage to Carriage) 99 23/32" 109"
Column to Column Width 110 1/32" 123"
Column Cross Section 12 7/32"L x 9 27/32"W 14 3/8"L x 7 13/16"W
Driving Mode Dual hydraulic cylinders, direct drive Dual hydraulic cylinders, direct drive
Motor 220V Single Phase 3HP (recommend a 30A breaker) 220V Single Phase 3HP with Inverter Motor (recommend a 30A breaker)
Hydraulic Oil 3.2-5 gallons AW32/AW46 (Not Included) 3-5 gallons AW32/AW46 (Not Included)
Time to full rise 75 seconds 75 seconds
Shipping Weight 2100 LB 2500LB
Shipping package size 146"L x 33"W x21"H 117"L x 22"W x 50"H
Arm Assembly Symmetrical Arm Assembly Symmetrical Arm Assembly
Front Arms 2 stages reach from 32 5/32" to 49 7/32" Straight Front 3 Stage reach from 37 1/2" to 72 3/16"
Back Arms 2 stages reach from 32 5/32" to 49 7/32" Straight Rear 3 Stage reach from 37 1/2" to 72 3/16"
Column Steel Thickness 1/4" 1/4"
Carriage Steel Thickness 1/4" 1/4"
Carriage Yoke Thickness 13/32" 3/4"
Arm Steel Thickness 5/16" 5/16"
Base Plate Steel Thickness 5/8" 13/16"
Truck Adapters (Height Extensions) Two Sets: 2 3/4" Tall and 5 1/2" Tall Two Sets: 3" Tall and 6" Tall
Other Parts Included
  • 10 anchor bolts
  • 10 shims
Optional Parts 2 3/4" and 6" Tall Truck Adapters
Concrete Requirement 6" thick at 3500 psi reinforced with fiberglass or steel (4" thick for vehicles 9000LB and below)
Model HW-12HD
(This Model)		 AP-12SR
(for Comparison)

Features

  • Direct drive mode
  • Durable hydraulic system
  • Easy to operate and maintain
  • Single point safety lock release
  • Double Seal Rings Protecting PU Material
  • Carriage and Coloumn Material Q235B Steel
  • Lifting operation by pressing "UP" button on motor
  • Manual lowering operation by pressing lever
  • Relief valve built in power pump to prevent overloading
  • Automatic arm lock restraints
  • Relief valve built in power pump to prevent overloading
  • Door guards protection rubber
  • Up-limit switch to protect cylinders working stroke used in safe length scope
  • Heavy duty 3/8" diameter cable and 3" pulley that reduce high stress on synchronization process and increase cable life
  • Ultra high molecular self lubricating nylon slider that ensures carriage smooth moving up and down

All 2-Post Car Lifts
